s0393.literal: Eighth year, Lu killed Duke Yin and established Duke Huan.
s0393.idiomatic: Eighth year, Lu killed Duke Yin and established Duke Huan.

s0394.chinese: 十三年，伐鄭，鄭射傷桓王，桓王去歸。
s0394.literal: Thirteenth year, he attacked Zheng. Zheng shot and wounded King Huan, King Huan left and returned.
s0394.idiomatic: Thirteenth year, he attacked Zheng. Zheng shot and wounded King Huan, King Huan left and returned.

s0395.chinese: 二十三年，桓王崩，子莊王佗立。
s0395.literal: Twenty-third year, King Huan died, his son King Zhuang Tuo ascended.
s0395.idiomatic: Twenty-third year, King Huan died, his son King Zhuang Tuo ascended.

s0396.chinese: 莊王四年，周公黑肩欲殺莊王而立王子克。
s0396.literal: King Zhuang's fourth year, Zhou Gong Hei Jian wished to kill King Zhuang and establish Prince Ke.
s0396.idiomatic: King Zhuang's fourth year, Zhou Gong Hei Jian wished to kill King Zhuang and establish Prince Ke.

s0397.literal: Xin Bo informed the king, the king killed Zhou Gong.
s0397.idiomatic: Xin Bo informed the king, the king killed Zhou Gong.

s0399.chinese: 十五年，莊王崩，子釐王胡齊立。
s0399.literal: Fifteenth year, King Zhuang died, his son King Xi Hu Qi ascended.
s0399.idiomatic: Fifteenth year, King Zhuang died, his son King Xi Hu Qi ascended.

s0400.literal: King Xi's third year, Duke Huan of Qi first became hegemon.
s0400.idiomatic: King Xi's third year, Duke Huan of Qi first became hegemon.

s0401.chinese: 五年，釐王崩，子惠王閬立。
s0401.literal: Fifth year, King Xi died, his son King Hui Lang ascended.
s0401.idiomatic: Fifth year, King Xi died, his son King Hui Lang ascended.

s0403.chinese: 初，莊王嬖姬姚，生子穨，穨有寵。
s0403.literal: At first, King Zhuang favored consort Yao, she gave birth to a son Kui, Kui was favored.
s0403.idiomatic: At first, King Zhuang favored consort Yao, she gave birth to a son Kui, Kui was favored.

s0404.chinese: 及惠王即位，奪其大臣以為囿，故大夫邊伯等五人作亂，謀召燕、衛師，伐惠王。
s0404.literal: When King Hui ascended, he took away his minister's park to make it his own preserve, therefore the ministers Bian Bo and four others rebelled, plotting to summon Yan and Wei armies to attack King Hui.
s0404.idiomatic: When King Hui ascended, he took away his minister's park to make it his own preserve, therefore the ministers Bian Bo and four others rebelled, plotting to summon Yan and Wei armies to attack King Hui.

s0405.literal: King Hui fled to Wen, then resided at Zheng's Li.
s0405.idiomatic: King Hui fled to Wen, then resided at Zheng's Li.

s0406.literal: They established King Xi's younger brother Kui as king.
s0406.idiomatic: They established King Xi's younger brother Kui as king.

s0407.literal: They made music and danced everywhere, the lords of Zheng and Guo were angry.
s0407.idiomatic: They made music and danced everywhere, the lords of Zheng and Guo were angry.

s0408.chinese: 四年，鄭與虢君伐殺王穨，復入惠王。
s0408.literal: Fourth year, Zheng and Guo's lords attacked and killed King Kui, restored King Hui.
s0408.idiomatic: Fourth year, Zheng and Guo's lords attacked and killed King Kui, restored King Hui.

s0409.chinese: 惠王十年，賜齊桓公為伯。
s0409.literal: King Hui's tenth year, he granted Duke Huan of Qi to be the overlord.
s0409.idiomatic: King Hui's tenth year, he granted Duke Huan of Qi to be the overlord.

s0410.chinese: 二十五年，惠王崩，子襄王鄭立。
s0410.literal: Twenty-fifth year, King Hui died, his son King Xiang Zheng ascended.
s0410.idiomatic: Twenty-fifth year, King Hui died, his son King Xiang Zheng ascended.

s0411.chinese: 襄王母蚤死，後母曰惠后。
s0411.literal: King Xiang's mother died early, his stepmother was called Hui Hou.
s0411.idiomatic: King Xiang's mother died early, his stepmother was called Hui Hou.

s0412.chinese: 惠后生叔帶，有寵於惠王，襄王畏之。
s0412.literal: Hui Hou gave birth to Shu Dai, who was favored by King Hui, King Xiang feared him.
s0412.idiomatic: Hui Hou gave birth to Shu Dai, who was favored by King Hui, King Xiang feared him.
